data.weather: Last rainfall of 7mm on Thursday 11th making 12mm in August to date. Dry since. Thursday morning - dry, cloudy, mild. Met office forecast: Thursday - dry, cloud fragmenting to give way to prolonged sunny spells, 21 degrees. Friday - dry and cloudy morning, front of rain passing through region from lunchtime and during afternoon, clearing overnight, 18 degrees. Saturday - dry from midnight until lunchtime, then mixture of sunshine and showers, 19 degrees.
data.stalls: Planned stalls positions for Ebor Festival: 5f and 6f two year old only races - farside; 5f, 5f89yds, 6f and 1m4f for three year olds and up - centre; remainder - inside rail.
data.rail: Planned rail alignment for Ebor Festival: Thursday racing on traditional racing line, no adjustment to official race distances; Friday - rail moved out 3 yards on home bend adding 8 yards to race over one mile, 9 yards to races of 9f and over. Saturday - will review rail alignment after racing on Friday.
